data.name: My Lovely Daughter - OST and Artbook
data.detailed_description:
DLC Content
This DLC package contains both the haunting original soundtrack for My Lovely Daughter and the eerie yet beautiful artbook of My Lovely Daughter. Be careful! this DLC may contain spoiler of the game.

Track List
1. The Genius Alchemist (02:13)
2. Subtle Memories (02:15)
3. Tribute To My Daughter (01:34)
4. Unfolded memories (02:06)
5. Ode To My Daughter (01:36)
6. The Truth (00:36)
7. Masquerade Unmasked (02:54)
8. It's Time To Cook (00:43) - Bonus Track
9. I'm Not Your Father (02:02) - Bonus Track
10. Painful Remorse (01:48) - Bonus Track

Accessing The DLC
After purchasing and downloading My Lovely Daughter - OST and Artbook, you can access the content in the game's directory folder. Here are the steps to access the files:
  • Open up Steam and go to your Library tab
  • Right click on My Lovely Daughter and select Properties
  • In the Properties window, select Local Files tab and find the "Browse Local Files" button.
  • This will take you to the My Lovely Daughter's game directory, which has the OST and Artbook folder included in it.
As for the OST, you can also enjoy it via your Steam Music Library

data.short_description: The haunting original soundtrack and the eerie yet beautiful artbook of My Lovely Daughter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP 2+
  • Processor: 1.5GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Mono
  • Additional Notes: Use mp3 player to play music and pdf reader to read the artbook

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS
  • Processor: 1.5GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Mono
  • Additional Notes: Use mp3 player to play music and pdf reader to read the artbook

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 1.5GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Mono
  • Additional Notes: Use mp3 player to play music and pdf reader to read the artbook
